Luna Grace has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, fish and spices for her food vending business.

Susan has been in this business for six years. Susan earns more income from working in a general store.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, fish and spices

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of charcoal to sell.

Lucia has been in this business for twelve years. Lucia earns more income from working in a general store.

Lucia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Leizel

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Leizel works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Leizel is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets for her fishing business.

Leizel has been sustaining her business activities through her past sixteen loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets

loans.name: Cresilda

texts.en:
Cresilda is forty-two years old and a married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Cresilda has a beauty parlor business in the Philippines. Cresilda requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy new supplies for her beauty parlor.

Cresilda has been in this business for six years. In the future, Cresilda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her beauty parlor.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. Teresita is married and has a business selling curtains in the Philippines.

Teresita requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of curtains to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of curtains to sell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a very happy and humble man. He has a plot of land less than two hours from Nairobi where he grows bananas and napier grass. He is also a very hardworking man. He has 7 cows that are very healthy and happy looking. It is a small plot, but with a lot of activities going on that make for a very lively farm. His only complaint is how expensive cooking fuel has become. With a biogas system he will have unlimited free cooking gas for his family. Please help Peter to buy a biogas system so that all he needs for cooking is to use the waste of his cows!

loans.use: to pay for a biogas system to have clean cooking energy for his family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of clothes in order to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Forty-five year old Marcelina lives in Talibon, Bohol. She is a married woman with two children aged ten and seventeen. She earns a living by engaging in producing hollow blocks.  Aside from that, she also runs a small bakery. It has been almost five years since she started working in these businesses.

She is asking for a loan to buy additional materials like cement, sand, gravel and water. These materials will be used in making hollow blocks, which she will sell in her local community. With her profits, she will be able to continue sending her children to school and provide them with proper diets.

Marcelina dreams of being successful by expanding her business to make it productive and sustainable in the near future.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like cement, sand, gravel and water

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Carmelita works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling peanuts and other root crops in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from farming rice and buying and selling charcoal. Carmelita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock for her peanut and root crops business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further develop her businesses.

Carmelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past twenty-one loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of peanuts and other root crops

loans.name: Roda

texts.en:
Roda is forty-two years old and a married woman with two children, who are both in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Roda has a food vending business in the Philippines. Roda requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Roda has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Roda would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Maria Rima

texts.en:
Maria Rima is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Maria Rima has been in this business for two years. Maria Rima earns more income from working in a general store.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn works hard to support her family. Marilyn is a widow and has a bakery business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like yeast, flour, margarine and sugar.

Marilyn has been in this business for thirty years now.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like yeast, flour, margarine and sugar

loans.name: Wilfreda

texts.en:
Wilfreda is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Wilfreda is forty-nine years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Wilfreda has a business buying and selling jewelry in the Philippines. Wilfreda requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of jewelry to sell to her customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Wilfreda has been in this business for five years. In the future, Wilfreda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of jewelry to sell to her customers

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is forty-one years old and married with eight children, four of whom attend school, Marites works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, noodles and chips.

Marites has been in this business for one year.

In the future Marites would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, noodles and chips

loans.name: Gricerio

texts.es:
Gricerio tiene 57 años de edad, es casado. Su familia es unida, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus 02 menores hijos en casa de material rústico hecha de piedra y barro en el Caserío de Miraflores, su población se dedica a la agricultura (café, frutales, maíz, papas, yucas y hortalizas), crianza de animales menores, ganado vacuno y comercio, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café desde hace cinco años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como patos, gallinas y cerdos. Gricerio es un hombre trabajador que cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para su cultivo de café, de esta manera Gricerio espera generar mayores ingresos y por ende aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gricerio is 57 years old and is married. His family is united and he lives with his wife and his two young children in a house made from rustic materials such as stone and mud in Caserío de Miraflores where the people earn a living in agriculture (coffee, fruits, corn, potatoes, yucca and green vegetables), breeding small animals, cattle farming and business. It is located in the province of Cutervo in the Cajamarca region in the northern sierra of Peru.
For 5 years he has made a living in farming, especially coffee growing. Additionally he earns a living breeding small animals such as ducks, hens and pigs. Gricerio is a hard working man with experience in business and with very good personal and work references in the area. He is asking for this loan to invest in buying manure and fertilizers to grow coffee. In this way, Gricerio hopes to earn a better income and therefore improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in buying manure and fertilizers for growing coffee.

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie is sixty years old, married and has two children, one of whom is in school.  

She is in the agricultural business pig fattening in the Philippines. Marjorie requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marjorie has been pig fattening for five years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Sron

texts.en: Residing living in Kampong Cham province, Sron is fifty-six years old and a mother of one child. Nowadays, she can earn income to support her family conditions via hiring the farmland to farmers. For Sron, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her entire loan portion on paying tuition fees for her daughter, who wants to pursue a bachelor's degree. She hopes that her daughter can get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay tuition fees for her daughter

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Chamka Leu district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet

loans.name: Mary Chel

texts.en:
Mary Chel is thirty-six years old and married with three children who are in school. Mary Chel works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell like chips, egg, canned goods, soap and shampoo.

Mary Chel has been in this business for ten years. In the future she would like to save her money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell like chips, egg, canned goods, soap and shampoo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a biogas system for clean cooking fuel for his family

loans.name: Wicklife's Group

texts.en:
Wicklife's Group is formed by 12 farmers in Kakamega South District and is being represented by Wicklife, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 38 years old, is married and has 2 children. Wicklife has been a farmer for 2 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Wicklife isn’t new to One Acre Fund, he actually joined the program in 2014 and has since noticed his life has changed; especially in the sense that he has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year, Wicklife will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Using this loan, Wicklife's Group will purchase a total of 9 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo tiene 29 años, es casado, vive con su cónyuge y sus cinco menores hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro de 4 años. Adicionalmente también se dedica a prestar servicios como peón agrícola y obrero de mantenimiento de carretera de la zona. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. De esta manera Arnaldo espera mejorar tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productivamente su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna para poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, lo cual se verá reflejado en un mayor nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 29 years old, he is married and lives with his wife and his five young children in his own house made from rustic materials in the district of Pucará in the province of Jaén in the Cajamarca region in the northern sierra of Peru. The people of this district mainly earn a living in agriculture, animal farming and business.
Arnaldo earns a living in agriculture, specifically in growing coffee in which he has 4 years of experience. Additionally he earns a living in lending his services as a farming labourer and a road maintenance labourer in the area. He has very good personal and work references in the area. This loan will be used to buy manure and fertilizers to maintain his coffee growing and also for hiring labourers for the harvesting season. In this way, Arnaldo hopes to improve the his coffee growing physiologically, morphologically and productively as well as having a good harvest so as to be able to satisfy the needs of his customers, which will be reflected in a better level of income and therefore improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his coffee growing and to hire labour.

loans.name: Faaolataga

texts.en:
Faaolataga is 32 years old and married with five children. She has owned and operated a small store, selling a variety of items, for the past 12 years.

Faaolataga became a member of SPBD in 2002 to gain access to capital for her business. She needs a loan to buy a new chest freezer, a display fridge, canned items, soft drinks, snacks, new weighing scales, frozen goods, and bags of rice, sugar and flour. Faaolataga hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new chest freezer, a display fridge, canned items, soft drinks, snacks, new weighing scales, frozen goods, and bags of rice, sugar and flour

loans.name: Foliga

texts.en:
Foliga is a 34-year-old woman who is unmarried with three children. She has owned and operated a retail shop and also a cattle farm to earn additional income for the past seven years.

Foliga joined SPBD in 2007 to gain access to financial services. She needs a loan to buy a chest freezer, a display fridge, frozen goods, canned items, four young calves, barbed wire, iron poles and a large water tub. Foliga will use her profits to help with her family's weekly expenses and also to help with the expansion of her businesses.

loans.use: to buy a chest freezer, a display fridge, frozen goods, canned items, four young calves, barbed wire, iron poles and a large water tub

loans.name: Veasna

texts.en:
Veasna is a 27-year-old married driver who works for a guesthouse and he lives in Siem Reap province of Cambodia. He is also a student who is studying information technology in the fourth year. His wife is a 26-year-old receptionist. Both of them can make around $7 a day. 

Due to the fact that he lacks finances to pay his fourth-year tuition fees, Veasna would like to apply for a loan. With this loan, he will earn a bachelor's degree successfully. For his dreams, he is going to find another better job so he will be able to save money to run a clothes shop.

loans.use: to pay his fourth-year tuition fees.

loans.name: Malaetia

texts.en:
Malaetia is a 32-year-old woman who is married with three children. She owns and operates a retail store and also a large cattle farm to earn extra income. 

Malaetia joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services. She needs a loan to buy two new display fridges, a new chest freezer, canned items, frozen goods, a cash register machine and two young calves for the farm. Malaetia will use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses and also to help expand her business.

loans.use: to buy two new display fridges, a new chest freezer, canned items, frozen goods, a cash register machine and two young calves for the farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beams, zinc sheets, bricks, iron bars, cement, sand, and gravel to build her house.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 27 years old, married and has one child who is in school.

She is in the agricultural business, pig-fattening in the Philippines. Mary Grace requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Mary Grace has been pig-fattening for 5 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future she would save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy works hard to support her family. Mary Joy is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to by additional sacks of rice to sell.

Mary Joy has been in this business for 6 years now.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Vith's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Kampong Speu province, Vith is 36 years old and a father of five children. He earns income to support his family via rice cropping. He has been involved this business for ages and earns him about 25,000 KHR per day. 

For Vith, this is his first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of four members, he is a group leader. He will spend his loan portion to build a decent latrine. He hopes that he can improve his family's standard of living and make it healthier.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine.

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Felipa Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Felipa del Socorro, es madre de tres hijos de los cuales solo uno esta bajo su cargo, labora como intendente de  uno de los mercados de la Ciudad de León desde hace diecisiete años, inicia sus labores desde las 07:00 am finalizando a las 03:00 pm de lunes a sábado, ella realiza este trabajo para llevar el sustento a su hogar.

Doña Felipa, solicito este crédito a Ceprodel para la  compra de hierro, bloques, cemento, arena y piedrín, dichos materiales fueron implementados en la reconstrucción y remodelación de su humilde vivienda, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Felipa del Socorro has three children; only one depends on her. She has been working as a clerk for a store located in León for seventeen years. She starts working at 07:00 am and finishes at 03:00 pm, Monday to Saturday. With this job, she sustains her home.

Felipa requested this loan from Ceprodel to buy iron bars, bricks, cement, sand and gravel. With these materials, she rebuilt and remodeled her humble house, which will increase her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy iron, bricks, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tiles, cement and pay for labour costs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her childrens' university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay medical expenses for special tests

loans.name: Juntas De La Mano Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Juntas de la Mano está integrado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito, una de ellas es Leticia de 26 años de edad, acompañada, y se dedica a la comercialización de perfumes Avon y ropa en su domicilio desde hace dos años. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en diferentes perfumes para damas y caballeros de marca Avon, pantalones, shores, blusas, camisetas, sabanas, cobertores, etc. Con los financiamientos anteriores ha comprado una vitrina y varios maniquís para exhibir la ropa a los clientes. La segunda socia es la señora Reyna de 42 años de edad, y se dedica a la venta de productos Avon y Zermat desde hace dos años y la tercera socia es la señora Jasmina de 35 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace dos años.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Juntas de la Mano is made up of 3 successful entrepreneurs.  One member is Leticia, who is 26 years old and in a relationship.  She has made a living selling Avon perfumes and clothing from her home for 2 years.  She is asking for a loan to invest in different Avon perfumes for men and women, pants, shorts, shirts, T-shirts, sheets, and blankets, among other items.  With her previous loans, she bought a display cabinet and some mannequins to display clothing to her customers.  

The other group members are 42-year-old Reyna who has been selling Avon and Zermat products for 2 years, and 35-year-old Jasmina who has been selling food for 2 years.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's Avon brand perfume, pants, shorts, shirts, T-shirts, sheets, and blankets, among other items, and to increase sales

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc for the construction of his house.

loans.name: Usmon

texts.ru:
Усмон выходец из района Дж.Расулова города Худжанд. Он 53-летний семейный человек, проживающий с женой, дочерью, сыном, невесткой и внуком. Усмон в селе имеет свою чайхану, где посетителям готовит свои фирменные блюда плов и таджикский суп. Он по натуре целеустремленный человек и сейчас решил расширить свой предпринимательский бизнес. Усмон готовится открыть одну точку под автомойку. Он уже приобрел помещение, которое изображено на фотографии. Усмон будет использовать его под автомойку. Однако чтобы запустить дело, ему не хватает еще немного средств. На сумму запрашиваемого кредита Усмон хочет приобрести двух больших железных ворот и оплатить за шифер, который уже установлен на крыше помещения. Оборудования и средства для мойки машин у него уже есть. Он будет продолжать работать в своей чайхане, а в автомойку возьмет на работу нескольких рабочих и управлять ими. 
Усмон надеется, что благодаря с вашей поддержкой он сможет реализовать свои намеченные бизнес-планы.
texts.en:
Usmon is a native of the J. Rasulov region in the city of Khujand. He is a 53 years old family man, who lives with his wife, daughter, son, daughter-in-law and grandchild. Usmon has a tea-house in the village, where he prepares specialties and Tajik pilaf soup to his visitors. 

By nature, Usmon is purposeful, and currently he has decided to expand his business. He is preparing to open a car wash. He already bought premises, which you can see in the photo. Usmon will use it for the car wash. However, he is still missing some money in order to start the business. 

For the requested loan amount, Usmon would like to purchase two large iron gates and pay for slate, which is already installed on the roof of the building. He already has the facilities and equipment for the car wash. He will continue working in the tea house and employ some workers for the car wash.

Usmon hopes that thanks to your support, he will be able to realize his business plans.

loans.use: to purchase two large iron gates and to pay for slate

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay medical expenses (medicine and special tests)

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
La socia  Raquel se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de  maíz y también se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza,  la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de maíz. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar maíz.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Raquel continues working in her business, selling corn.  She also continues working in her beauty product sales business..  Through this business she wants to get ahead.  Her dream is to expand her corn-selling business.  She is asking for this loan to buy corn.

She is happy because of this loan and is committed to making her established payments.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Jovita

texts.es:
La socia  Jovita se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este pequeño negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia ya tiene varios años, el sueño de la socia es tener otra tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar,aceite, leche y galletas.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jovita continues working at her grocery store. She sells essential goods, like rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She wants to succeed through this small business, which she has had for several years.

Her dream is to have another grocery store. She is requesting this loan to buy rice, sugar, oil, milk and cookies. She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Benjasmin Oliver

texts.es:
Benjasmin, de 41 años de edad, tiene cinco años de estar casado, su esposa hace poco dio a luz su primer hijo, que apenas tiene unos días de nacido.

Benjasmin, tiene alrededor de 27 años de trabajar como albañil, el se dedico a ésta labor cuando en su hogar había mucha pobreza,  fue así como ayudaba a su familia,  actualmente el hace sus propias construcciones y le da empleo a tres personas más aproximadamente.

El dinero de este préstamo será invertido para pagarle al médico que atendió el parto de su esposa, el monto es de $800 pero él ya tiene $300 y solo necesita el resto. 

Benjasmin, desea darle mejores condiciones de vida a su esposa e hijo, en un futuro planea mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Benjasmin, age 41, has been married for five years.  Just a little while ago his wife gave birth to their first child, who is just a few days old now.

Benjasmin has been working as a construction worker for about 27 years.  He chose this line of work at a time when there was a lot of poverty in his home, and it was in this way that he helped his family.  Currently he does his own construction projects and gives employment to about three other people.

The money from this loan will be used to pay the doctor who took care of his wife’s delivery.  The total amount is $800, but he already has $300 and only needs the balance.

Benjasmin wants to improve his wife’s and his child’s living conditions; in the future he is planning to improve his home.

loans.use: to pay the doctor who took care of his wife's delivery

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel un hombre de 58 años de edad que a través de interactuar quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de juguetería para fin de año, la razón es que muchos clientes lo frecuentan por saber la calidad de productos que vende y pro sus buenos precios y Miguel no cuenta con capital para abastecer su negocio.
Es padre de 3 hijos y trabaja diariamente las horas que sean necesarias para vender lo suficiente para llevar alimento a su hogar.
Apoya a este hombre que pro su avanzada edad tiene que cuidar su trabajo pues seguramente no podrá emplearse.
texts.en:
Miguel, 58, wants to ask Interactuar for a loan to buy toys for the end of the year.  A lot of customers visit his toy store because they know the quality and good prices of the products he sells, but Miguel doesn't have the capital to stock his business.

He's the father of three children and he works whatever hours necessary every day so he can sell enough to put food on the table.

Support this man who has to watch out for his job because he probably won't be able to get hired at his advanced age.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products for his toy store

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es:
La socia Segundina  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de frutas,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia vende platanos,mandarinas, naranjas y manzanas , la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas . La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mandarinas,naranjas, plátanos y uvas . 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Segundina continues working in her fruit-selling business.  She hopes to get ahead through her business.  She sells bananas, clementines, oranges, and apples.  She has been in this business for a number of years and it is going well for her.  Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell her fruit.  She is asking for a loan to buy clementines, oranges, bananas, and grapes.

She is happy to have this loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy clementines, oranges, bananas, and grapes

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es: Leonardo: Es un hombre trabajador, pequeño comerciante, originario de Bilwi,  tiene 60 años de edad, es casado, con cinco hijos mayores de edad que ya son independientes. El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar mercadería para incrementar los productos en su pequeña tienda de granos básicos y otros productos alimenticios y de esa manera también mejorar los ingresos económicos. Su sueño es tener un negocio próspero con un  local construido de cemento y acondicionado para dar una mejor atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a hardworking man—a small-time vendor from Bilwi.  He is 60 years old and married, with five adult children who live on their own.  

The loan he is requesting is to buy merchandise to expand the products offered in his small store, where he sells basic staples and other food items.  In this way he can also improve his financial earnings.  

His dream is to have a prosperous business in an air-conditioned shop built from cement, in order to provide his customers better service.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and increase the number of products in his small store where he sells basic staples and other food items.

loans.name: Lorena Patricia

texts.es: Lorena es una joven de 25 años de edad, domiciliada en un barrio en el municipio de Soledad, se encuentra dedicada a su negocio de venta de repuestos de motocicletas al por mayor, ella trabajó por un tiempo en el almacén de su suegro,  quien también tiene un almacén de este mismo formato en donde adquirió  toda la experiencia necesaria para asumir el reto.  Esta emprendedora mujer distribuye todo tipo de repuestos entre ellos rodamientos, bandas, neumáticos, cadenas, y demás tipos de accesorios para motocicletas, lleva cinco años de funcionamiento y sus principales clientes son talleres y almacenes que comercializan accesorios de lujo y repuestos de motocicletas. En la actualidad ella está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual iniciará un almacén para vender al detal repuestos y accesorios de Motocicletas, considerando que podrá obtener mayores ganancias.  Lorena esta muy entusiasta con esta oportunidad de incluirse en este nuevo mercado, en él ella como proveedora podrá obtener un mayor margen de utilidad.
texts.en:
Lorena is a 25 year old young woman who lives in a neighbourhood of the town of Soledad. She runs her business selling motorcycle parts wholesale. For a time she worked in her father in law's store, who had a store of the same type where she gained all the necessary experience to take on the challenge of her own business. 

This enterprising woman distributes all kinds of spare parts including bearings, belts, tyres, chains and other types of accessories for motorcycles. She has been running for five years and her main customers are garages and stores which sell luxury accessories and motorcycle spare parts.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan (the first loan she has taken out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo) with which she will start a store to sell motorcycle accessories and spare parts retail. With this she will be able to obtain better profits. Lorena is very enthusiastic about the opportunity to be included in this new market, where with herself as the supplier she will be able to obtain a better profit margin.

loans.use: to begin a store to sell motorcycle spare parts and accessories retail.

loans.name: Angelica Maria

texts.es: ANGELICA MARIA: Es una mujer luchadora, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 30 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos menores de edad. Todavía no tiene casa propia, vive en casa de familiares, desde hace 14 años habita en una vivienda de minifalda de concreto y mader. Con el propósito de reducir el hacinamiento y comprar su propio terreno y construir su vivienda de minifalda, solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar materiales de construcción: cemento, bloques, madera, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda para que su familia viva de manera segura.
texts.en:
Angelica Maria: She is a hard-working woman who is from Puerto Cabezas. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children who are not yet grown up. She does not have her own home yet, but lives with relatives. For 14 years, she has been living in a house made of concrete and wood. 

In order to have more room, to buy her own plot and to construct a wooden house there, she is asking for her first loan to buy construction materials (like cement, bricks, wood, nails), and also to pay for labor.

It is her dream to finish building her home, so that her family can live in safety.

loans.use: to buy her own plot and to build a house.

loans.name: Sayram

texts.ru: Сайраму 53 года. Она проживает на районе Гиссар. Майрам замужем и имеет пятерых детей. Сайрам настоящая дехканка. Она родилась в семье, где трудились на земле, зарабатывая честным трудом, и она унаследовала эту деятельность. Муж Сайрама также работает на земле. Она с мужем бок в бок работают вместе, и многое пережили вдвоем. На данный момент они занимаются посевом лука. Сайрам уже закончила посев и теперь необходимо обработать их минеральными удобрениями. Для приобретения достаточного количества минеральных удобрений ей не хватает денег, и она решила обратиться за кредитом с надеждой на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Sayram is 53 years old. She lives in the Gissar region. Sayram is married and has five children. She is a real dekhan farmer. She was born into a family that worked the land, earning a living through honest work, and she inherited this business. Her husband also works in the field. 

Sayram and her husband work side by side and have been through a lot together. Currently they are sowing onions. Sayram already finished the sowing and currently she needs to process it with mineral fertilizer. She does not have enough money to purchase a sufficient amount of fertilizer, and she decided to apply for a loan with the hope of your support.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy chickens in bulk.

loans.name: Melly

texts.en:
Melly is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Melly is 54 years old and has one child who is in school.

She has a buy and sell coconut business in the Philippines. Melly requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional coconuts to sell.

Melly has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional coconuts to sell

loans.name: Makhfirat

texts.ru: Махфират 39 летняя жительница не большого городка под названием Куляб. Она очень добрая отзывчивая, вежливая, трудолюбивая и горячо гостеприимная женщина. Махфират мать одиночка. Она с двумя детьми проживает у отца. Ее отцу 69 лет, он работает в заводе по производству пиво. Дочке 20 лет она студентка, сыну 17 лет он учиться в средней школе. Махфират работает уборщицей, она по вечерам убирается местной школе. Дополнительно Махфират дома занимается шитьем национальной женской одежды. Она на дому принимает заказы. Махфират более 5 лет продвигает швейную деятельность. Сейчас для нее необходимо купить новую швейную машинки, потому что скоро ее нынешняя машинка выйдет из строя. Махфират не хочет лишиться источника дохода и видит выход из данного положения в получения кредита.
texts.en:
Makhfirat is a 39 years old woman from a small town named Kulob. She is a very good, responsible, polite, hardworking and warmly welcoming woman. Makhfirat is a single mother. She and her two children live at her father's house. Her father is 69 years old. He works in a factory producing beer. Makhfirat's daughter is 20 years old and a student. Her son is 17 years old and he goes to high school.

Makhfirat works as a cleaner. She cleans at the local school in the evenings. In addition, Makhfirat sews women's national clothing. She takes orders at home. Makhfirat has had a sewing business for more than five years. Currently she needs to purchase a new sewing machine, as her current sewing machine is failing. 

Makhfirat does not want to lose her source of income and sees receiving a loan as a way out of this situation.

loans.use: to purchase a new, modern sewing machine

loans.name: Delfina Marleny

texts.es: Delfina de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas y su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hamacas desde hace varios años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales a utilizar como hilos y nailon de colores y asi poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Delfina is 32 years old and lives with her partner and their three daughters in their own home. For several years she has worked making and selling hammocks, and she has many customers because of the quality of her products and her good prices.

Delfina is asking for a loan to buy materials to use in her hammock making, like thread and nylon fiber in various colors, so that she can continue with her work and improve her income.

loans.use: buy thread and nylon fibers in various colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a warming case, a steel counter, a charcoal grill and a griddle for arepas [a traditional treat]

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia, de 60 años de edad, no tiene ningún grado académico, ella aprendió a leer y escribir gracias a que su único hijo le enseño ya que él es maestro en un centro educativo, su esposo trabaja como empleado desde hace diez años en la alcaldía de la ciudad.

Cuando Alicia se casó, decidió junto con su esposo poner un negocio de venta de verduras, es así como ahora tienen más de cuarenta y cinco años de tener su pequeño puesto, pero además, para estas fechas de fin de año venden pólvora.

El dinero de este préstamo será invertido para comprar pólvora ya que en el mes de diciembre es cuando ella vende dicha mercadería. 

La prioridad que ella tiene es comprar dicha mercadería y con la las ganancias pagará el crédito y con la parte que le quede lo invertirá en su otro negocio.
texts.en:
Alicia is 60 years old and has no academic degree. Her only son, a schoolteacher, taught her how to read and write. Her husband has worked as an employee of city hall for 10 years.

When Alicia married her husband, they decided to start a business selling vegetables.  They have now had their small stand for 45 years. This time of year they also sell fireworks.

The money from this loan will be invested in the purchase of fireworks because she sells them in the month of December.

Her priority is to buy these goods and with the profits pay the loan and invest the remaining portion into her business.

loans.use: to buy fireworks because she sells them in the month of December.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina, de 62 años de edad, estudió hasta 3º grado, ella se acompañó cuando tenía 17 años y tuvo dos hijos, uno de ellos falleció hace 11 años en un accidente y el otro ya no vive con ella porque está acompañado, actualmente Marina, vive sola junto a una hermana. 

Marina, se dedica a comprar y vender pollos y gallinas, esta actividad la aprendió de su madre pues ella la acompañaba desde pequeña en estas actividades y ahora ella las realiza sola.

Marina, todos los días sale a comprar pollos y gallinas en los cantones cercanos donde ella vive, ella sale casa por casa a comprar de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana los lleva a vender a la plaza, en donde llegan a comprarlos.

Anteriormente, ella había obtenido un crédito, para mejorar las jaulas en donde mantenía sus aves de corral, ahora necesita más dinero para comprar muchos más.-
Gracias al apoyo de los créditos y a su gran esfuerzo ha logrado tener un negocio bastante rentable para su familia.

Ahora, ella necesita el préstamo para comprar pollos y gallinas.

El sueño de Marina es, tener una vivienda digna, en donde puede vivir en las condiciones adecuadas.
texts.en:
Marina is 62 years old. She studied up to 3rd grade in school and she found her partner when she was 17 years old. They had two children, but one of them passed away 11 years ago in an accident, and the other one does not live with her but has his own partner. At the moment, Marina lives alone with her sister.

Marina works buying and selling chickens and hens. She learnt this activity from her mother, because she has worked with her mother in this activity since she was very small, and today she works in this business on her own. Every day, Marina goes to purchase chickens and hens and the nearby cantons to where she lives. She goes from house to house to purchase them Monday through Friday, and on the weekends she brings them to sell in the plaza where people come to purchase them.

Marina has taken out a loan before in order to improve the cages where she keeps her poultry. Now she needs more money in order to buy much more. Thanks to the help through the loans, and thanks to her great efforts, she has managed to create a business which is very profitable for her family. Now she needs a loan to buy chickens and hens.

It is Marina's dream to have a dignified home, where she can live in acceptable living conditions.

loans.use: to buy chickens and hens.

loans.name: Angela Petrona

texts.es:
Ángela, de 33 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, la situación económica de sus padres los llevo a que ya no estudiará, por esa razón decidieron ponerla a realizar trabajos domésticos.- Se casó a los 19 años, su esposo se dedica a la pesca y la agricultura, esa es la principal fuente de ingreso, juntos han procreado 3 hijos, todos son menores de edad.

Ella se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco, su esposo pesca durante la noche y ella lo vende en el día, ya tiene sus clientes, ella sale a los caseríos vecinos para poder llevarlo hasta donde viven sus clientes. 

El trabajo lo aprendió por la necesidad que tenían de tener ingresos para sostener el hogar, tiene más de 6 años de dedicarse a la venta de pescado, su horario de venta es de las 6:00 a.m. a 10:00 a.m. o hasta que termina la venta.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar un equipo de pesca, para su esposo ya que el que tienen está bastante deteriorado.- Esto les ayudará para hacer más eficiente su trabajo y obtener mayor número de peces. 

El sueño más deseado de Ángela es que sus hijos estudien y sean personas de bien para la sociedad, también, desea hacerle algunas modificaciones a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ángela is 33 years old. She went to school up to the fourth grade.  Because of her parents' financial situation, she couldn't go to school. and that's why they decided to have her do domestic work. She married at 19 and her husband works in fishing and farming. This is their main source of income. They have 3 children, all them are minors. 

She sells fried fish. Her husband fishes at night and she sells it during the day. She already has customers and she goes to the neighboring communities to be able to take it to where her customers live. 

She learned the work out of a need to have income to support the home. She has been selling fish for more than 6 years. Her schedule is from 6 a.m. until 10:00 a.m., or until she finishes selling.  

The loan will be invested in buying fishing equipment, because her husband's has deteriorated a lot. This will help him do his job more efficiently and obtain a larger number of fish. 

Ángela's biggest dream is for her children to go to school and be upright members of society. She also wants to make some changes on her house.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment.

loans.name: Satkynbu

texts.ru: Саткынбу, 36 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Саткынбу высшее образование, в качестве основного источника дохода для семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав бизнес 10 лет назад. На данный момент в хозяйстве Саткынбу имеется 2 коровы, 15 овец. Также на 1,0 ГА собственной земли она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячная прибыль- 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Саткынбу обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и теленка. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Satkynbu is 36 years old, married and the mother of five children. Satkynbu has higher education. As a main source of income for her family, she works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started this business 10 years ago. Currently Satkynbu has two cows and 15 sheep on her farm. She also has 1.0 hectares of land on which she grows barley. The monthly income is 8,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further develop her business, Satkynbu turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 35,000 som (KGS) to purchase some sheep and a calf. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase a few sheep and a calf for fattening up and reselling

loans.name: Angel Antonio

texts.es: Angel de 27 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 13 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de trasmallos y una nueva hielera y asi poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Angel is 27 years old and lives in his own house with his mother. He has been an artisan fisherman for 13 years and sells his products in various markets.

He is asking for a loan so he can buy trammel nets and a new cooler so that he can continue working and increasing his income.

loans.use: to buy trammel nets and a new cooler.

loans.name: Jairo Ivan

texts.es: Jairo de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la reparación de motos desde hace varios años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene logra salir adelante, él está solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos para motos por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jairo is 40 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife. He has repaired motorcycles for a living for several years. His business is located in his residence and he has a lot of customers. He is able to get ahead with what he earns. He is asking for a loan to buy motorcycle replacement parts wholesale so he can continue with his sales and thus have more income.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle replacement parts wholesale.

loans.name: Deysi Guadalupe

texts.es:
Deysi, vende comida y pupusas, vive sola, es soltera y no tiene hijos; su negocio funciona desde hace 7 meses y nace por la necesidad cubrir sus gastos personales, desempeña estas actividades con ayuda de una empleada, el horario en que atiende al público es de 6:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m., no representa dificultades en administrar su negocio. 
Comprará carnes, pollo, verduras, quesillo, aceite, bebidas, etc., preparara la comida y las pupusas para ofrecer a sus clientes, espera brindar mejor servicio, atraer a nuevos clientes y tener mejores ingresos para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
Sus sueños son crecer con su negocio y lograr tener estabilidad económica para tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Deysi sells meals and pupusas. She lives alone, is single and has no children. Her business has been running for 7 months and was born out of the need to support herself. She carries out her business with the help of an employee. She is open to the public from 6 am until 7 pm and she has no difficulties in running her business.

She will buy meat, chicken, vegetables, cheese, oil, drinks etc. to prepare the meals and pupusas to offer to her clients.. She hopes to provide better service, attract new customers and have higher income to meet her obligations. Her dream is to grow with her business and obtain economic stability to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, vegetables, cheese, oil, drinks, etc. to prepare meals and pupusas to offer to her clients.

loans.name: Famille Rukengwa Group

texts.fr: Alphonse a acquis une partie de son champ de par sa famille et l'autre a été achetée par ses propres moyens. Il sollicite ce crédit afin de couvrir les frais de la main d'oeuvre et ainsi améliorer la production dans le but de régler ses problèmes familiaux. Il remercie PAIDEK pour l'initiative de crédit aux caféiculteurs à KALEHE. Alphonse est l'homme sur la photo et est le chef du groupe famille RUKENGWA.
texts.en: Alphonse acquired part of his field from his family and he paid for the rest himself. He requests a loan to cover the cost of labour and also to increase the production to help him with his family problems. He thanks Paidek for their initiative of making loans available to coffee growers in Kalehe. Alphonse is the man in the photo and is the leader of the Rukengwa family group.

loans.use: to pay for hoeing, mulching, and labour costs for the production.

loans.name: Sonia Yanira

texts.es: Sonia de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia  tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sonia is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and daughter.  She has a small store located in her place of residence. She has many customers for a variety of products.  With her sales, she has managed to solve some of her household expenses.

She is asking for this loan to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, etc. so she can obtain higher income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Jose Noe

texts.es:
José, con el préstamo anterior conto con el recurso económico para invertir en insumos agrícolas que le han permitido tener una cosecha abundante de maíz y yuca, sus ingresos está mejorando y comparte con su familia un nivel de vida mejor.
En esta oportunidad solicita capital para pagar mozos que le ayuden a realizar los trabajos de recolección de la cosecha, le será de utilidad para tener en menor tiempo su producto y así lo distribuirá entre sus clientes.
texts.en:
The previous loan gave José the economic resources to buy agricultural inputs that yielded him an abundant corn and yuca harvest.  His income is improving and he's providing his family with a better standard of living.

Currently he's requesting capital to pay the assistants who will help him collect the harvest.  This will be useful to him for having his crop in less time so he can distribute it to his customers.

loans.use: to pay the assistants who will help him collect the harvest

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 73 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su hija de 35 años de edad, que desde hace algunos años es su única compañía. Él es un hombre trabajador que desde hace 40 años se gana la vida cultivando la tierra, por lo que se siente feliz de poder sostener la economía de su hogar apoyado en su trabajo. Manuel desea encementar el piso y comprar puertas para su vivienda, ya que actualmente su piso es de tierra, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, y puertas para encementar el piso e instalar puertas en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Manuel is 73 years old. He lives in his own home with his 35-year-old daughter, who has been his only company for a couple of years. He is a hard-working man, who has earned his living cultivating his fields for 40 years, and he is happy that he can keep up the economy of his household with his work.

Manual wants to cement the floor and to buy doors for his home. At the moment, he has an earth floor. For this reason, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest it in the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, and doors, to cement the floor, and to install doors in his home.

loans.use: to invest it in: cement, sand, gravel, and doors, to cement the floor and to install doors in his home.

loans.name: Jhosselyn

texts.es: Jhosselyn tiene 19 años de edad es conviviente con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella se encuentra en el último  año de sus estudios de confección industrial con miras a la especialización en ropas para niños. Ella decidió estudiar esa carrera porque le gusta y ve que tiene muchas entradas. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materiales telas y accesorios  para confeccionar  su vestidos de bodas y quinceañera. Que lo presentara como prenda final para  aprobar su carrera. Su meta al concluir sus estudio es implementar su propio taller para poder desempeñar su carrera con ampliar libertad. Ella agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado.
texts.en: Jhosselyn is 19 years old. She is in a common law marriage and has 1 dependent child. She is in the last year of studying industrial sewing and intends to specialize in children's clothing. She decided to study this major because she likes it and she sees that it has a lot of opportunities. She is going to invest the loan in buying fabrics and accessories to make wedding and quinceañera dresses. She will present them as her final project to graduate.  Her goal when she finishes her education is to open her own shop so she can practice her profession with freedom. She thanks the Kiva investors for the loan they have provided.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and accessories.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, ha mejorado su negocio con la inversión del financiamiento anterior en su negocio de venta de calzado, con la ganancias está mejorando la calidad de vida familiar y poco a poco está cancelado su propiedad.
Opta por un nuevo préstamo para invertir en zapatos tenis, sandalias y chancletas para ambos sexos tanto para adulto como para niños, su propósito es renovar el inventario de su negocio para seguir compitiendo en el mercado y atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en: Marta has improved her business of selling footwear with the previous loan. With her profits she has improved the quality of living of her family and little by little she has been paying off her property. She has decided to take a new loan to invest in buying tennis shoes, sandals and flip-flops for both sexes, for adults as well as children. Her aim is to renew her business' inventory to continue to compete in the market and serve her clients better.

loans.use: to invest in runners, sandals and flip-flops for both sexes for adults as well as children with the purpose of renewing the inventory of her business.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: Claudia, tiene 32 años de edad, es madre soltera con tres hijos, reside en el Municipio de Villanueva, Cortes. Ella trabajó por varios años en una maquila, y al quedar sin empleo decidió invertir para iniciar su propio negocio y estableció una pulpería para vender productos alimenticios como ser arroz, azúcar, churros, refrescos, manteca, dulces, pan, café, huevos, embutidos, harina, cereales, productos enlatados y de aseo. Este negocio lo ha mantenido reinvirtiendo sus ganancias y de allí ha podido cubrir los gastos del hogar. Actualmente solicita un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para surtir con mas productos como refrescos, churros, embutidos, productos enlatados, huevos, leche, azúcar y otros para surtir y mantener activo su negocio. Considera que el préstamo le ayudará a incrementar el inventario y ahora será mejor administradora. Su plan es mejorar las condiciones del local del negocio para lograr estabilidad y poderles dar el estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Claudia is 32 years old and is a single mom with three children. She lives in the municipality of Villanueva, Cortes. She worked for several years in a manufacturing plant, but when she lost her job she decided to invest in starting her own business. 

She established a small grocery store to sell such items as rice, sugar, chips, soft drinks, shortening, sweets, bread, coffee, eggs, sausages, flour, cereals, canned goods, and cleaning supplies. She has been reinvesting her earnings in the business and has also been able to cover her household expenses. 

She is now asking for a loan of 15,000 Lempiras to stock up her store with more products such as soft drinks, chips, sausages, canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc. to keep her business active. She thinks the loan will help her to increase her inventory and become a better manager. Her plan is to fix up the store, have more stability, and to provide an education for her children.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, chips, sausages, canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc. to stock her store and keep it active.

loans.name: Sokhorn's Group

texts.en: Sokhorn, a local farmer from Kampong Speu province, is 55 years old and a widowed mother blessed with three children. To improve her family condition, she grows rice as a main source of her income. She has been involved this business for ages and earns about 25,000 KHR per day. For Sokhorn, this is her fourth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. In a group of three, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy a set of latrine. She hopes that she can update her family living to be healthier than before.

loans.use: To buy a set of latrine.

loans.name: Famille Bukurunghe Group

texts.fr: Janvier président du groupe Bukurunghe, a hérité de champs de café à la mort de son père, il y a maintenant 6 ans. La main d'oeuvre pour les travaux de champs pose souvent problème raison pour laquelle il sollicite ce crédit pour mener à bien cette activité. Il a l'espoir que cela lui permettre d'accroitre la qualité et la quantité de la recolte afin de résoudre les problèmes d'ordre familial. Sur la photo, Janvier est habillé en chemise bleue blanche.
texts.en: Janvier, who is the president of the Bukurunghe group, inherited coffee fields when his father died, six years ago now. The costs of labour for the fields is often a problem for him, which is why he requests this loan to manage this activity. He hopes that the loan will enable him to improve the quality and increase the quantity of the harvest in order to sort out his family problems. In the photo, Janvier is wearing a white and blue shirt.

loans.use: to pay for the upkeep (mulching and pruning of the plants) and labour costs for the harvest.

loans.name: Oscar Vidal

texts.es: Oscar de 50 años de edad habita en vivienda propia el lado de su madre, por lo que se siente feliz de poder ayudarla en su vejez. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como motorista de un medio de transporte para empleados, ya que todos los días se despierta desde muy temprano para llevar a las personas a sus trabajos. Oscar desea construir un drenaje de agua lluvia, ya que en época lluviosa el agua se acumula, ocasionando anidación de insectos, además desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda, que se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, polines, pines, tubos, cemento y arena para construir un drenaje y cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Oscar, 50, lives in his own house with his mother.  He's happy to be able to help her in her old age.  He's a hardworking man who earns a living as a driver for an employee transportation service, waking up early every day to take people to their jobs.

Oscar wants to build a rainwater drainage system because water accumulates during the rainy season and causes insect nesting.  He also wants to replace his deteriorating roof.

He's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheeting, poles, pins, tubes, cement, and sand to build a drainage system and to put a new roof on his house.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, poles, pins, tubes, cement, and sand to build a drainage system and to put a new roof on his house

loans.name: Shohida

texts.en:
Shohida is a good person. She lives in a rural area. She is married. She has two children. She has had a business for about 15 years. Her husband helps with the business. She works planting crops and keeping livestock. She doe not have any other business besides agriculture. 

She is planning to buy cattle for enlarging her business. She needs financial support for doing business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for enlarging her business

loans.name: Sonia Claribel

texts.es: Sonia de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en:
Sonia, 40 years old, is a single mother who lives in her own home with her daughter.

She makes a living selling clothing from a stall located near her home. She has many steady customers due to the quality and good price of her items. 

Sonia  is requesting a loan to buy more clothing at wholesale so that she can continue with her sales and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy more clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Federico Antonio

texts.es:
FEDERICO DE 39 AÑOS DE EDAD, CASADO CON DOS HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD LOS CUALES ESTUDIAN EN PRIMARIA Y SECUNDARIA RESPECTIVAMENTE, ES ORIGINARIA DE  LEÓN, LUGAR  QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA DE OCCIDENTE DEL PAÍS,  SE CARACTERIZA POR SER TRABAJADOR, RESPONSABLE, CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL.  LAMENTABLEMENTE POR FALTA DE RECURSOS ECONÓMICOS NO PUDO ESTUDIAR Y  SE DEDICO A SU NEGOCIO PARA SACAR ADELANTE A SU FAMILIA.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA LA VENTA DE REPUESTOS DE VEHÍCULOS Y ACCESORIOS DE MANERA AMBULANTE, EN LA FOTO PODEMOS APRECIAR QUE SE MUESTRA LAS ALFOMBRAS PARA LOS VEHÍCULOS. TAMBIÉN EN SU CASA POSEE UNA PULPERA LA CUAL SE ENCARGA SU ESPOSA DE LA ADMINISTRACIÓN DE LA MISMA. EL NEGOCIO CONSISTE  EN VERDE REPUESTOS COMO: LLANTAS, FRENOS, CABLES, ACEITE, NEUMÁTICOS, BOMBA DE AIRE, ETC. PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS Y PODER SATISFACER LA DEMANDA DE SUS CLIENTES Y MANTENER PROSPERO EL NEGOCIO. FEDERICO AGRADECE LA  AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAÍSES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
Federico is 39 years old. He is married and has two minor children who are in primary and secondary school, respectively. He is from Leon, a place that is located in the western area of the country. He is described as being hardworking, responsible, and eager to get ahead personally. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources, he wasn't able to go to school and he worked at his business to get his family ahead. 

Thanks to his eagerness to get ahead, his economic activity is selling vehicle replacement parts and accessories as a street vendor. In the photo we can see him showing rugs for vehicles. In his house, he also has a store that his wife is in charge of managing. The business is selling replacement parts such as tires, brakes, cables, oil, tubes, air pumps, etc., so that in the not so distant future he can obtain better income and be able to satisfy his customers' demands and keep his business prosperous. Federico is grateful for the help the Kiva investors offer to people of low income and poor countries such as Nicaragua so that they can have dignified work.

loans.use: in buying replacement parts for vehicles, such as tires, brakes, cables, oil, tubes, air pumps, etc.

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
ISABEL  DE 45 ANOS AÑOS DE EDAD, CASADA CON UN HIJO EN CUAL ESTA ESTUDIANDO EN LA UNIVERSIDAD, ES ORIGINARIA DE  LEÓN, LUGAR QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA DE OCCIDENTE DEL PAÍS, ESTA JOVEN MUJER SE CARACTERIZA POR SER TRABAJADORA, RESPONSABLES CON MUCHAS GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN TANTO DE ELLA COMO PARA SUS FAMILIA,  EN LA ACTUALIDAD LUCHA PARA VER REALIZADO SU MAYOR SUEÑO COMO ES FORMAR A SU HIJO EN UN PROFESIONAL Y QUE TENGA MEJORES OPORTUNIDADES DE VIDA.
GRACIAS  A SU GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA LA VENTA DE ROPA INTERIOR DE LA MARCA LOVABLE EN CUAL DISTRIBUYE DE FORMA AMBULANTE Y POR ENCARGO Y EN SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN, TIENE CINCO ANOS DE DEDICARSE A  ESTA ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA, EN LOS FOTOS MUESTRA CATALOGOS DE LA ROPA QUE OFRECE AL CLIENTE.  LA CUAL DESEMPEÑA CON MUCHO GUSTO, YA QUE LE AYUDA A SUFRAGAR ALGUNOS GASTOS DE HOGAR. EL NEGOCIO CONSISTE EN VERDE ROPA INTERIOR COMO: BLUMER, BRASIER, HILO DENTALES, FAJAS REDUCTORAS, BOSER. Y LA FORMA DE RECUPERACIÓN ES QUINCENAL SEGÚN LA FORMA DE PAGO DEL CLIENTE. EL OBJETIVO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO  PARA QUE PODER SATISFACER LA DEMANDA DE SUS CLIENTES, Y EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS.  ISABEL AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAÍSES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
Isabel, 45 years old, is married with one child who is a student in the university. She is originally from León, a place located in the western part of the country. This young woman is characterized as being hardworking, responsible, with a great desire to improve herself as well as her family. Currently, she struggles to see her biggest dream realized, which is to make her son into a professional, so that he has better opportunities in life.

Thanks to her desire to improve herself, she works selling Lovable brand lingerie, which she sells as a street vendor and by order and in her house; she has done this work for five years. In the photo, she shows the catalogs with the clothing that she offers the customers, which she does with pleasure, since it help her to defray some of the household expenses. The business includes selling lingerie such as bloomers, bras, dental floss, girdles, boxers.  She collects every two weeks according to the the customer's form of payment, and in the not-very-distant future, she can get better income. Isabel is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people with limited economic resources and in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of merchandise such as para bloomers, bras, dental floss, girdles, and boxers.

loans.name: Angeles

texts.en:
Angeles is 60 years old and married with two children.

Angeles works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 24,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Angeles has borrowed and paid 27 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 40 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Angeles aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Catalina works hard to support her family.

She has a pig-raising business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Catalina is borrowing 29,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Catalina has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 32 years old and single with three children, two of whom are in school. Leah works very hard to provide for her family.

Leah runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc.

Leah has been in this business for four years. 

In the future, Leah would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Markus

texts.en: Markus is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Markus would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, in order to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Markus can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked about his goals, Markus has expressed a desire to use the extra income to provide food and clothing for his family, and in the long run, to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing for his family, thereby eliminating pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Pedro Ramon

texts.es:
PEDRO DE 45 ANOS DE EDAD, CASADO CON SEIS HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD TODOS ESTUDIAN EN LA PRIMARIA, ES ORIGINARIO DE MANAGUA, ES UNA PERSONA RESPONSABLES, TRABAJADORA, CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL, LAMENTABLEMENTE NO PUDO ESTUDIAR POR FALTA DE RECURSOS ECONÓMICOS Y SE DEDICO APRENDER SU  OFICIO COMO SASTRE Y LA ELABORACIÓN DE  COSTURA, EN LA ACTUALIDAD LE HA DADO MUY BUENOS RESULTADOS, YA QUE ES SU FORMA DE VIDA Y LA DE SU FAMILIA.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE, TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA UN TALLER DE COSTURA, UBICADO EN SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN, DESDE HACE QUINCE AÑOS QUE DESEMPEÑA EL NEGOCIO Y CONSISTE EN ELABORAR PRENDAS COMO ALMOHADAS, TOALLAS, SABANAS, EDREDONES, Y TRABAJA PRINCIPALMENTE POR ENCARGO, LA RUTINA DE TRABAJO DE ESTE HOMBRE ES DE UNAS DIEZ HORAS DIARIAS, OFRECIENDO SUS SERVICIOS EN SU TALLER DE COSTURA, EL OBJETIVO DEL CRÉDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO CON LA COMPRA DE MATERIA PRIMA COMO:  TELA, HILOS, ENCAJES, BOTONES, BROCHES, ZIPPER, CINTAS,  PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS Y REALIZAR ALGUNOS DE SUEÑOS COMO ES REALIZAR MEJORAS EN SU VIVIENDA Y DARLE MEJORES ESTABILIDAD A SU FAMILIA. PEDRO AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS  Y PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
Pedro, 45 years old, is married with six young children, all who are students in the primary school. He is originally from Manuaga.  He is a responsible, hard-working person, with desire to improve himself. Unfortunately he couldn't go to school due to lack of economic resources, and he worked to learn the trade of tailoring and sewing things. Currently it has given very good results and it is his way of life and that for his family.

Thanks to his desire to get ahead, he has a tailoring shop as his work, located in his house; he has had this business for fifteen years and it includes making articles such as pillows, towels, sheets, bedspreads, and he works primarily to order. This man's work routine is some ten hours each day, offering his services in his tailoring shop. The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock his business with the purchase of raw material such as fabric, thread, lace, buttons, fasteners, zippers, and ribbon, so that in the not-so-distant future he can get more income and make some of his dreams come true such as making repairs to his house and giving more stability to his family. Pedro is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of limited economic resources and in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in raw material for his tailor shop such as fabric, thread, lace, buttons, fasteners, zippers, and ribbon.

loans.name: Carlos Edgardo

texts.es: Carlos de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el posee un taller radio técnico desde hace 20 años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza su trabajo, adicional a eso también vende ropa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos por mayor y ropa para poder continuar con su trabjo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Carlos, 48 years old, lives in his own house with his three children. He has had a radio technician's workshop for the past 20 years. He has many customers due to the quality with which he does his work. In addition to this, he sells clothing. He is asking for a loan to purchase spare parts in bulk and clothing to be able to continue with his work and in this way have more income.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts in bulk and clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to restock the out-of-stock items in mama lishe and to increase on the genge stock.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano tiene 40 años de edad, es padre soltero, con 1 hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Mariano se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, desde hace 03 años, su servicio lo ofrece en el distrito y alrededores; él solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; pues desea realizar el mantenimiento de su mototaxi para poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mariano is 40 years old. He is a single father with 1 son. He lives in his own home in a rural area of the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru. His community mostly works in agriculture, livestock and commerce. 

Mariano works offering transportation in his motorcycle taxi. He has offered his service for 3 years in the district and the surrounding areas. He is asking for the loan to invest in fixed assets. He wants to to maintenance on his motorcycle taxi so he can offer a better service to his customers. This will allow him to improve his income in the short term, increasing his profits and thus his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi so he can offer a better service to his customers.

loans.name: Muia

texts.en:
Muia is 30 years old, married, and together with his spouse, has been blessed with two children. He does farming in Oloitoktok town and it has been profitable. Right now he makes a monthly income of KES 15,000. 

He plans to use this loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for planting in his farm. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children. 

This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and his future hopes are to grow his business and be prosperous.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for planting.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en: Nargis is a 40-years-old married woman. She is a mother of two children. She adores her family and her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband started his own business of selling iron material, eight years ago. Nargis is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. He will use the loan amount to increase his supply of iron products including iron rods, iron sheet, soldering rods, and welding rods. This is so that he can respond quickly to customer needs. He plans to expand his business with the additional income he earns. Nargis hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy iron material for reselling

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: As a married parent of three children, Vivian works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish and vegetable vending. Vivian is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell for her rice retailing  business. Vivian has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Nadabo

texts.en:
Nadabo is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Nadabo joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Firera, Kabiru and Abubakar.
