Before he became a Babban Gona member, Nadabo would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Nadabo can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Nadabo spoke of his  ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to ensure his children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for children's school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Carmen Marina

texts.es: carmen de 36 años de edad posee desde hace varios años una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella vive en casa propia  está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carmen, 36 years old, has had a store located in her home for a number of years; she has many customers due to her good prices and the friendliness with which she makes her sales. She lives in her own house and is asking for a loan to purchase more soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads, and in this way be able to have more income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Ever José

texts.es:
El señor Ever siempre con el anhelo de superarse y mejorar sus condiciones de vida, con ayuda de su esposa ha salido adelante, su mayor sueño es terminar de construir su casita.
solicita este cuarto crédito para la compra de Materiales de Construcción: cemento, arena, Zinc ya que construirá un pequeño muro para darle mayor seguridad a su vivienda y cambiarle también el techo a la casa.
Agradece la confianza que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado con estos financiamiento ya que sus condiciones han mejorado y su familia vive mas segura y feliz
texts.en:
Ever always has the desire to better himself and improve his quality of life; with the help of his wife he has gotten ahead. His biggest dream is to finish building his house. 

He asks for this fourth loan to purchase construction materials, cement, sand, metal sheeting to build a small wall go give his house more security and also to replace the roof on his house. 

He is thankful for the confidence that Kiva and Afodenic have offered him with these loans since his conditions have improved and his family lives more securely and happily.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Felicita De Maria

texts.es: felicita de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos como golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, café, sopas, huevos, gelatinas, azúcar, etc. y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Felicita, 60 years old, lives in her own house with her daughter. She has a small store located in her home where she sells a variety of products such as sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, jellies, sugar, etc. and she has many customers due to her good prices. She is asking for a loan to purchase more merchandise in bulk since this is her only source of income and in this way she will be able to have more earnings for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, jellies, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install potable water in her kitchen, bathroom and washing area to provide a better future for her family.

loans.name: Mercidita

texts.en:
Mercidita is a 43-year-old married woman with nine children, three attend school, Mercidita works very hard to provide for them.

She has run a charcoal business for 3 years and requests 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

In the future Mercidita would like to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Dina Ruth

texts.es:
Dina, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo porque de esta manera puede tener de inmediato la facilidad de comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas, vestidos, traje, etc., para adultos y niños/as, para tener a sus clientes satisfechos.
La inversión anterior le ha permitido crecer con su negocio, ganar nuevos clientes, salir adelante con su familia, ofrecer empleo a una persona para que le ayude con a atender el negocio y resarcir su deuda.
texts.en:
Dina has decided to ask for a new loan because she will immediately be able to buy pants, shirts, blouses, dresses, suits, etc. for adults and children, in order to satisfy her customers.

The previous investment has allowed her business to grow, gain new customers, and offer employment to a person to help with the business.  She has been able to succeed with her family and is repaying her debt.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses, dresses, suits, etc. for adults and children in order to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith es una mujer de 34 años de edad, casada, tiene 1 hijo varón de 10, años, su Actividad  es la confección de tejidos artesanales hechos a mano.
Ella es independiente, buena madre, responsable, activa y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la feria de la zona ‘16 de julio’, caracterizada por el comercio informal donde se puede encontrar desde una aguja para coser hasta un tractor. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía entre los 2-18 grados centígrados durante el día y todo el año pero ella vive en la localidad de batallas a 1 hora de la ciudad de El Alto.
Judith es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, baja estatura, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), y su lengua materna es el aymará y habla español para el comercio. Su negocio es la confección de tejidos de forma artesanal (a mano), para luego comercializarlas los días jueves y domingos en la feria ’16 de julio’. Su prendas más solicitadas son; chompas cuello alto, chalecos, bufandas, guantes, gorros y otros. “Aquí hace mucho frío y mis prendas se venden todo el año, por eso tengo un negocio rentable y constante…” comenta. su sueño es tener un taller de confección de tejidos para ampliar su mercado y desea realizar la compra de una máquina de tejer para producir en mayor cantidad. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Judith solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de tejer industrial para producir en cantidad.
texts.en:
Judith is 34 years old, married and has a 10-year-old son. Her job is making artisanal knitted items by hand. She is a good mother and an independent, responsible, active, hard-working woman. Judith is short and has a dark complexion; long, black, braided hair; wears traditional clothing (hat, shawl, and pollera skirt). Her native language is Aymara and she speaks Spanish for business. 

She operates her business out of the "16 de julio" flea market on Thursdays and Sundays.  The market is characterized by informal trade where one can buy things ranging from a sewing needle to a tractor. The climate there is cold and dry with temperatures ranging from 2 - 18 degrees celcius (36-64 F) during the day throughout the year. But she lives in Batallas, one hour from the city of El Alto. 

Her most requested items are turtleneck sweaters, vests, scarves, gloves, hats, etc. "It is very cold here and people buy my things all year long, and that is why I have a profitable, stable business" she states. Her dream is to have a knitting shop to expand her market, and she would like to buy a knitting machine to increase her productivity. 

This is her first loan cycle in the 15 years she has been engaging in this business. These are the reasons why she is asking for a loan - to buy a knitting machine so she can produce in greater quantity.

loans.use: to buy an industrial knitting machine.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 37 años de edad, su estado civil es madre soltera, con 2 hijos a su cargo y vive en casa de sus padres, ella cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, la zona cuenta con mas de 10 mil habitantes y vive en zona urbana, y es muy responsable. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Mariela es la venta de abarrotes, pollo, entre otros. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 3 años, en su domicilio. El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio comprará abarrotes y panetones por campaña navideña. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el producto se vende de manera diaria en la zona. Mariela piensa trabajar otorgando buen producto e incrementando sus ventas, Llo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mariela is 37 years old. She is a single mother with two children she is responsible for. She lives in the house of her parents. She has good personal and employment references in her area. The area has more than 10,000 inhabitants and she lives in an urban zone and is very responsible. Her community works mainly in agriculture, raising cattle and commerce. It is located in the district and province of Morropón, Piura region, on the North Coast of Peru.

Mariela's business is selling groceries, chicken and others. She has been doing this business for more than 3 years in her house. The loan will be used to invest in her business buying groceries and Christmas bread for the Christmas season. The market looks good as the product sells daily in the area. Mariela is thinking of working providing good products and increasing her sales. In the short term this will allow her to increase her income and her profits and in the end improve her quality of living and that of her family.

loans.use: to invest in her business to buy groceries and panettone for Christmas sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet.

loans.name: Norma De La Paz

texts.es:
Norma, tiene 44 años de edad, es madre  de dos hijos de 18 y 22 años de edad, todos viven juntos, por la responsabilidad de cubrir las necesidades de su hogar hace 5 años inicio a vender comida, lo hace de Lunes a Sábado, por el momento no representa dificultades en su negocio.
Requiere capital para comprar maíz, frijoles, arroz, verduras, condimentos, aceite y otros materiales para elaborar la variedad de comida que ofrece en su establecimiento, su objetivo es mejorar la calidad, higiene, ventas y ganancias de su comedor.
Norma tiene la visión de mantenerse trabajando para cancelar sus deudas, mejorar el nivel de vida familiar y dar a sus hijos un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Norma, 44, is the mother of two children, 18 and 22.  They all live together.

Five years ago she started selling food because she was responsible for covering the household necessities.  She works Monday through Saturday.  At present she has no problems with her business.

She needs capital to buy corn, beans, rice, vegetables, condiments, oil, and other materials to make the type of food she sells in her establishment.  Her goal is to improve her eatery's quality, cleanliness, sales, and profits.

Norma sees herself continuing to work to pay her debts, improve her family's standard of living, and give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, rice, vegetables, condiments, oil, and other supplies to make the variety of food she sells in her establishment

loans.name: Yon's Group

texts.en:
Yon lives in a rural area in Kampong Speu province and is a  56-year-old woman with five children. She grows rice as her main source of income and raises pigs and chickens to supplement her income. She can earn about 35,600 KHR per day. 

This is the fourth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has successfully repaid her previous loans. She leads a  group of 4 and will spend her loan portion to buy a  latrine. She hopes that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a latrine.
